definitions.definition: A type of paint with a solvent that evaporates to leave a hard , transparent , glossy film .
Anything resembling such a paint; glossy appearance.
a passenger train , probably derived from the varnished passenger cars used at one time.

main_definition: A type of paint with a solvent that evaporates to leave a hard , transparent , glossy film .
secondary_definitions: Anything resembling such a paint; glossy appearance.
( by extension ) A deceptively showy appearance .
( rail transport , US , informal , dated ) a passenger train , probably derived from the varnished passenger cars used at one time.
